title: Contributing
text: You can contribute by translating this comic book to your native language. If you are interested, get in touch with Dr. Anna Biller: anna.biller@tum.de

title: Lumi’s Delight
text:
This website hosts the comic book Lumi’s Delight and its various translations. The book is intended for young readers aged 6-10 years old but older readers hopefully enjoy the content, too!
Written and illustrated by Coline Weinzaepflen.
Edited by Dr Anna M Biller, Dr. Alejandra Parreño, Dr. Simone Stegbauer, Dr. Verena Streibel, and Dr. Matthew The.
